string.text: This will change the cooldown before Barrier Defense can start.\nDefault: 7 days
This will change the amount of days on a new save before Barrier Defense can start to appear.\nDefault: 7 days
This changes the number of enemy squads that spawn at the start of the Barrier Defense.\nDefault: 3 squads
Allows the Barrier quests to be repeatable or not.\nDefault: False
Decides whether or not the Monolith Barrier task can be rolled\nDefault: True
This changes the TOTAL number of Monolith squads that spawn for their Barrier Defense mission.\nDefault: 6 squads
Decides whether or not the Zombies Barrier task can be rolled\nDefault: True
This changes the TOTAL number of Zombified squads that spawn for their Barrier Defense mission.\nDefault: 8 squads
Allow the player to modify the chance of the event triggering when conditions are met. Setting it to 'False' will let the base script take care of the chance.\nDefault: False
Determine the chance of the Barrier Task triggering when conditions are met. THIS SETTING ONLY WORKS IF "Modify Trigger Chance" IS ENABLED\nDefault: 50
Controls whether to print useful debug information or not.\nDefault: False
